bibl.title: The Date of Claudius' British Campaign and the Mint of Alexandria.
bibl.note: An Alexandrian coin [ed.: Kevin HERBERT, Roman Imperial Coins. Augustus to Hadrian and Antonine Selections, 31 B.C. - A.D. 180. The John Max Wulfing Collection in Washington University. III (Wauconda, 1996), item 238] offers concrete evidence for a terminus ante of late July 43 for Claudius' personal intervention in the British campaign.
bibl.seg: BARRETT Anthony A., The Date of Claudius' British Campaign and the Mint of Alexandria.

An Alexandrian coin [ed.: Kevin HERBERT, Roman Imperial Coins. Augustus to Hadrian and Antonine Selections, 31 B.C. - A.D. 180. The John Max Wulfing Collection in Washington University. III (Wauconda, 1996), item 238] offers concrete evidence for a terminus ante of late July 43 for Claudius' personal intervention in the British campaign.
